# Copilot Instructions

## Language
我們的對話與所有指示應使用**繁體中文**進行。

## Slash Commands
We use slash commands from `@.github/prompts` for structured workflows:

- `/speckit.specify` - Create or update feature specification
- `/speckit.clarify` - Identify and resolve ambiguities in specs
- `/speckit.plan` - Develop implementation plan
- `/speckit.implement` - Execute implementation tasks
- `/speckit.analyze` - Analyze code and features
- `/speckit.checklist` - Generate comprehensive checklists
- `/speckit.constitution` - Define project constitution
- `/speckit.tasks` - Break down into actionable tasks

## Guidelines
- Use slash commands to maintain consistency and structure across development workflows
- Always document decisions and clarifications in feature specs
- Refer back to this file for language and command preferences
